description: A React component for a Tic Tac Toe game allowing players to make moves, determine the winner, and reset the game.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Checks the current board for a winner based on predefined winning combinations.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles a player click on the board, updates the board, checks for a winner, and switches the current player.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game board, current player, and winner state.

methods.name: getStatusMessage
methods.description: Generates a status message based on the current game state.
